articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Outgoing Indian Ambassadress
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Outgoing Indian Ambassadress
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Ri Yong Ho Monday met and had a talk with Jasminder Kasturia, Indian ambassadress to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: Press Statement of DPRK Permanent Mission to UN
articles.content:
Press Statement of DPRK Permanent Mission to UN
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The Permanent Mission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) to the United Nations on February 22 issued the following press statement with regard to the inappropriate remarks made by the UN secretary-general against the DPRK at the Munich Security Conference:
					 As is known to all, the UN secretary-general, in his address at the Security Conference held in Munich of Germany, made senseless remarks about the so-called "pressure through sanctions" against the DPRK, while referring to the strengthening of nuclear force of the DPRK as contradiction to the will of the international community. 
					
					 This is completely unreasonable sophistry that does not befit at all his position as UN secretary-general, giving us an impression that he is an advocate of the United States.
					
					 The nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula came into being and reached the present point, entirely due to the U.S., and thus, the U.S. should bear full responsibility for it.
					
					 The nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula would not have been brought up at all, if there had not been anti-DPRK hostile policy pursued by the U.S. from the first day of the foundation of the DPRK and if the hostile policy had not been developed to take the form of undisguised nuclear blackmail and threats against the DPRK.
					
					 The remarks of the secretary-general cannot be construed otherwise than a disgraceful behavior driven by extreme prejudice and injustice, as he condemned the righteous measure of the DPRK, without saying a word about the U.S., a culprit of aggravated situation, intentionally turning a blind eye to the essence and its underlying cause of the nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 The secretary-general should be clearly aware that nuclear threats come from the U.S. that is developing all kinds of sophisticated nuclear weapons and exposing its wild ambition for nuclear preemptive strike, and he would be well advised not to behave like somnambulist.
					
					 Our state nuclear force serves as strong deterrent to any nuclear threat and reckless military provocation of the U.S., and therefore, it will never pose threat to any country or region unless they infringe upon the sovereignty and interests of the DPRK. 
					
					 If the secretary-general is truly interested in addressing the nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula, it would be advisable that he immediately bring to the attention of the UN Security Council the issue of welcoming the process of improved inter-Korean relations and discouraging neighboring countries from disturbing the process, as has been requested by the letter dated 31 January of the DPRK foreign minister forwarded to the secretary-general.

articles.title: 23rd Winter Olympics Closes
articles.content:
23rd Winter Olympics Close
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The 23rd Winter Olympics which opened in Phyongchang of south Korea on Feb. 9 came to a close.
					 Its closing ceremony was held at the Phyongchang Olympic Stadium on Sunday.
					
					 Present there were a high-level delegation of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea led by Kim Yong Chol, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and its National Olympic Committee delegation and cheering group and a cheering group of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					 Attending it were President Moon Jae In and personages of political and social circles of south Korea, President of the International Olympic Committee Thomas Bach, high-ranking personages from different countries, foreign guests and sports fans.
					
					 When the players of the north and south of Korea participating in the 23rd Winter Olympics and other players and agents of different countries and region from across the world entered the stadium, the spectators welcomed them with applause.
					
					 Kim Yong Chol and President Moon Jae In and his wife stood up to wave to the players of the north and the south when they were going past the platform.
					
					 Amid the playing of the Olympic anthem, the Olympic flag was pulled down and conveyed to the host country of the 24th Winter Olympics.
					
					 The chairperson of the organizing committee of the Olympics and the president of the International Olympic Committee made speeches to be followed by a declaration of the close of the Olympics and the fire on the cauldron was put out.
					
					  Prior to the closing ceremony, Kim Yong Chol met and exchanged warm greetings with the DPRK players participating in the Olympics.

articles.title: DPRK National Olympic Committee Delegation Arrives in Pyongyang
articles.content:
DPRK National Olympic Committee Delegation Arrives in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the National Olympic Committee of the DPRK led by Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Kim Il Guk who is chairman of the DPRK Olympic Committee, arrived here on Monday after taking part in the 23rd Winter Olympics in south Korea.
					 The delegation came back together with the DPRK's sports team, cheering group and press corps, via Kaesong.
					
					 Earlier, the Taekwon-do demonstration group of the DPRK returned here after finishing the scheduled joint demonstrations of the north and south Taekwondoists.

articles.title: Delegation of Far Eastern Branch of Russian Academy of Sciences Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Far Eastern Branch of Russian Academy of Sciences Here
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Far Eastern Branch of the Russian Academy of Sciences led by Academician Valentine Sergiyenko, chief of the Branch who is vice-president of the Academy of Sciences, arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Freight Transport for Wonsan-Kalma Coastal Tourist Area Brisk
articles.content:
Freight Transport for Wonsan-Kalma Coastal Tourist Area Brisk
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- A work is in full swing in the DPRK to transport materials badly needed for the construction of the Wonsan-Kalma coastal tourist area.
					 The railway transport sector has so far carried tens of thousands of tons of cement, thousands of tons of steel, a large quantity of wood and gravels, etc. 
					
					 The Ministry of Railways has directed its efforts to increasing the rate of locomotive operations and cutting down the round-trip time of the goods wagons to the maximum.
					
					 It has established a regular traffic control system and shortened the loading and unloading time.
					
					 The Wonsan Rolling-Stock Complex, the Hamhung Rolling-Stock Parts Plant and other relevant units are supplying accessories and materials for train operation in time.

articles.title: Amnokgang Team Proves Successful in Women's Premier Soccer League Matches
articles.content:
Amnokgang Team Proves Successful in Women's Premier Soccer League Matches
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The Amnokgang team is taking the first place with three wins in three matches in the 2017-2018 DPRK women's premier soccer league matches.
					 In December last year the team defeated the April 25 team 2:1, the Naegohyang team 3:1 and the Rimyongsu team 1:0.
					
					 It took the first place in the women's football matches of the 12th People's Games held in November 2012 and finished second in the premier soccer matches of the DPRK Championships in 2014 and the Paektusan Prize Sports Games in 2016.
					
					 It produced many talented women footballers like Ra Un Sim, Hong Myong Gum, O Kum Hui and Ri Un Hyang who distinguished themselves in various international games.
					
					 This year's first match of the 2017-2018 DPRK women's premier soccer league matches is to be held on March 10. 
					
					 The Amnokgang team will have a match with the Jebi team that day.

articles.title: Driving Force of Korea's Reunification Is Korean Nation: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Driving Force of Korea's Reunification Is Korean Nation: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- For the north-south relations to continue to make progress, it is important to firmly maintain the stand of settling the issue of the north-south relations by the Korean nation itself on the principle of national independence, stresses Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 The driving force of the country's reunification is the Korean nation itself, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 It is the Korean nation which has vital interests in the reunification and it is also the Korean nation which has the ability for it. Only when the Koreans with ardent desire for the country's reunification pool their thinking and efforts, will it be possible to smoothly settle the reunification issue in line with the desire and interests of the nation.
					
					 If the north and the south pool intention and will while firmly maintaining the independent stand, no anti-reunification moves of outsiders can prove successful and a new turning phase will surely open in the improvement of the north-south ties.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should wage more courageous actions for independent reunification of the country, resolutely foiling the outsiders' interference in the internal issue of the nation, the country's reunification issue and obstruction moves against it, under the uplifted banner of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. Imperialists as Sworn Enemy of Korean People
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. Imperialists as Sworn Enemy of Korean People
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun in an article Monday brands the U.S. imperialists as the sworn enemy of the Korean people.
					 The U.S. imperialists' occupation of south Korea and their policy for aggression on Korea are the root cause of all misfortunes of the Korean nation, says the article, and goes on:
					
					 It is the U.S. imperialists that divided the homogeneous nation of the same blood, which has lived in one territory for over 5,000 years, into two. It is also the aggressor U.S. which occupied south Korea militarily and has imposed untold misfortunes and sufferings on our people, resorting to the ceaseless nuclear war provocations against the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK and the U.S. are still at a truce. The U.S. imperialists are our belligerent. Much upset by the situation that our Republic rapidly emerged a world-level nuclear power, military power, the Trump group is recklessly persisting in the nuclear war moves.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists remain unchanged in their black-hearted intention to invade our Republic. They never present peace and reunification to the Korean nation.
					
					 Our nation will never forget their crimes for all ages but make them pay dearly for the crimes.

articles.title: Resumption of Military Exercises Is Challenge to DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Resumption of Military Exercises Is Challenge to DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- As known, as the door to dialogue was opened between the north and the south after a long stall and the trend for improvement of their relations was seen, the Trump group became vociferous about the immediate resumption of Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills after the Winter Olympics.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday says:
					
					 The resumption of joint military exercises is a vicious challenge to the entire Korean nation hoping for detente and durable peace on the Korean peninsula and the DPRK making all possible efforts for the improvement of the north-south relations. It, therefore, can never be tolerated.
					
					 The peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula is a prerequisite to the improvement of the north-south ties.
					
					 However, the U.S. and its followers are trying hard to resume the exercises and thus quench the spirit for the improvement of the north-south ties and strain the military stand-off and tension to the maximum and, furthermore, stifle the DPRK by force at any cost.
					
					 Now the Trump group is calling for the resumption of the exercises on one hand and it is introducing huge preemptive attack means such as nuclear carrier and nuclear strategic bombers to and around south Korea on the other hand while spreading the story about "preventive preemptive attack" on someone.
					
					 If the U.S. resumes the joint military exercises, we will resolutely counter them.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservatives' Bid to Come Back to Power Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservatives' Bid to Come Back to Power Denounced
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Now the atmosphere of improved inter-Korean relations prevails on the Korean Peninsula thanks to the DPRK's proactive and sincere efforts and the expectation and interest of south Korean people are towering as the days go by. Whereas, the conservatives in south Korea, including the "Liberal Korea Party", are trembling with fear.
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun says in an article Monday:
					
					 The south Korean conservatives, obsessed with fear that they would totally be defeated, make desperate efforts to win the mindset of people who turned their backs on them, vociferating about "nuclear threats" from the DPRK, "strengthened alliance" with the U.S. and "mega-merger of conservatives".
					
					 The reality shows that while disturbing the improvement of the north-south relations in every way, they leave no means untried to take the initiative in political situation and rally the conservatives and thus lay a springboard for coming back to power in the elections for local governing bodies due in June.
					
					 For this sinister purpose they add to the atmosphere for confrontation between fellow countrymen in the society of south Korea, talking about "nuclear threats" from the DPRK and building up public opinion that their only way is to strengthen the "alliance" with the U.S. in an attempt to justify their sycophantic treacheries. And they try to put down the demand of the south Korean people for removing evils, talking about "renovation" and "new conservatism", and seek "mega-merger of conservatives."
					
					 No matter how desperately the south Korean conservatives may try to go against the trend of the times, they can never save their declined destiny, and the destruction of conservatism is a matter of time.

articles.title: Steadfast Is Our Will to Protect Peace: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Steadfast Is Our Will to Protect Peace: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The international community has praised respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un for steering the situation on the Korean Peninsula with his steadfast will to protect peace and achieve the independent national reunification.
					 Recently the Brazilian newspaper Tera and the Indonesian newspaper Jakarta Post, reporting about Kim Jong Un's revolutionary activities, said that he called for stirring up the atmosphere for reconciliation and dialogue and gave an instruction to take practical steps for improvement of the north-south relations when the U.S. and other countries hostile toward the DPRK pressed for "maximum pressure and sanctions".
					
					 ANI of India, Press TV Broadcasting of Iran, the Singaporean newspaper Straits Times, the Romanian newspaper Agerpres and other foreign media vied with each other to report about his noble patriotic intention and wise guidance.
					
					 This is the high praise for the great guardian of independence and justice and a fair appreciation of the DPRK's consistent and principled, peace-loving stand.
					
					 To improve the north-south relations and ensure durable peace on the Korean Peninsula is an urgent demand of our nation and an indispensable prerequisite to national reunification.
					
					 The DPRK has always worked hard to this end and preserved peace and security on this land by smashing every reckless nuclear war move of the U.S. with strong war deterrence.
					
					 This year there opened a dramatic opportunity of turn for peace, stability and reunification of the Korean Peninsula. This is a historic event attributable to the noble patriotism of the peerlessly great man and his will to achieve national reunification and protect peace.
					
					 The respected Supreme Leader in his New Year Address set forth the policy for great turn in the north-south relations and took proactive steps for its implementation one after another, thus providing a turning phase for national reunification.
					
					 Now the international community admires the fact that the north-south relations entered the phase of reconciliation, unity and detente from unprecedented catastrophe, hoping that such atmosphere will last.
					
					 However, as seen in the reality, the U.S. and other outsiders responsible for the division of the Korean nation are displeased with the improvement of the inter-Korean relations, making desperate efforts to turn the peaceful atmosphere on the Korean Peninsula back to confrontation and war.
					
					 No matter how desperately the separatist forces at home and abroad may try, they can never break the will of our nation to advance along the road of reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 We will bravely overcome all the adversities of history by concerted efforts of the nation and more vigorously struggle for durable peace on the Korean Peninsula and national reunification.

articles.title: Who Is Chieftain Posing "Threats": KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Who Is Chieftain Posing "Threats": KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- These days the Abe group of Japan vociferates about "threats" to Japan from the DPRK.
					 Prime Minister Abe and Defense Minister Onodera at the House of Representatives said that hundreds of Rodong missiles with the whole land of Japan in the striking range have been deployed in the DPRK, stressing the need to introduce long-range missiles capable of removing "threats from north Korea" outside Japan under the principle of "exclusive defense".
					
					 The Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan insisted that it would distribute the "guidelines to cope with crisis", containing the way of evacuation from ballistic missile launch of the DPRK and ways for connection with local self-government bodies, to schools across Japan to be used from March.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Abe group let Miura, a scholar on international politics, and other conservative experts spread rumor that hidden "assassination unit" of the DPRK may be in Tokyo or Osaka and that big cities of Japan would be targets of such terrorism in case of a war between the DPRK and the U.S., while intensifying the suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					 They are making desperate efforts to create terror-ridden atmosphere in the society of Japan under the pretence of "threats" from the DPRK. But it is a thinly-veiled trick.
					
					 The sordid intention of the Abe group, anti-DPRK confrontation fanatics, is to realize vile political purpose and ambition for reinvasion by actively spreading the rumor of "threats" from the DPRK.
					
					 It is just the Japanese reactionaries who displease the trend of reconciliation and peace on the Korean Peninsula which had been in the brink of war. Because such trend would offer no justification and pretext for them to advance toward militarism so as to turn Japan into a "country able to conduct a war" of which it has dreamed since its defeat.
					
					 The Abe group felt urgency for spoiling the atmosphere for peace and driving security uneasiness to the extremes. That's why the false rumor about deployment of missiles with the whole land of Japan in the striking range and "assassination unit" was badly needed for them.
					
					 They seek to train the younger generations into brutes occupied by hostility toward the DPRK and militarism by fanning up war-phobia even at schools.
					
					 The chieftain fostering unrest and terror in the society of Japan and posing threats to its proper is none other than the Abe group, and it is the Japanese people that are suffering the biggest damage from it.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries sharpening the sword for reinvasion, far from making an apology for the thrice-cursed crimes against the Korean nation, are the sworn enemy of the Koreans and a root cause of misfortunes in the society of Japan and the foe to peace in Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 Japan should stop such foolish act of inviting disasters to it, clearly understanding the strategic position of the DPRK and the trend of the times.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Members of a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star presented a letter to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on Feb. 24.
					 The letter said that Marshal Kim Jong Un invited a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan before all others to celebrations of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and bestowed boundless trust and loving care upon them, putting it forward on many honorable occasions, though he was very busy leading to victory the building of a powerful socialist country and a standoff with the U.S.
					
					 The days of the visit to the homeland which passed like a dream under the care of the great sun were unforgettable as we once again keenly felt pride and honor of being overseas citizens of the DPRK led by the greatest man in the world, the letter said.
					
					 It pointed out that the celebrations of the 76th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il that rocked the whole planet were the most vivid expression of the noblest moral obligation of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It said that Kim Jong Il will always be with us and the country of the great sun will prosper forever as we hold as our Supreme Leader in high esteem Kim Jong Un, who is a peerlessly great man demonstrating before the world the dignity and mightiness of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 It noted that we will resolutely defend and add luster to the immortal idea and exploits of the great leaders, pioneers of the Juche-oriented movement of overseas compatriots, as befit officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), who grew up under the care of Kim Jong Il, and devote our lives to consolidating Chongryon into the overseas patriotic organization of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: UCKR Meets to Mark Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
UCKR Meets to Mark Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia (UCKR) had a remembrance meeting in Moscow on Feb. 16, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Chairman Kim Chil Song noted in a speech that Kim Jong Il performed immortal, enormous exploits for the country and nation and the human cause of independence.
					
					 He turned the DPRK, small in territory and population, into an invincible power which the U.S. dares not provoke, the speaker said, adding: His greatest feat is that he put forward respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as the successor to the cause of Juche.
					
					 At the meeting members of the UCKR art troupe sang such songs as revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Jong Il", "A Dear Name" and "Don't Advance, Night of Pyongyang."

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Printed in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Printed in Venezuela
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in booklet at a Venezuelan publishing house on Feb. 8 in the run-up to the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The work, published on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation is a history which clearly proved the immovable truth that each country and nation can defend their dignity and guarantee their prosperity only when they have an outstanding leader.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for glorifying the dignity of the DPRK for all ages and successfully accomplishing the cause of building a powerful socialist country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Russian Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Russian Website
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- The full text of Leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Strengthening the People's Army and Creating a Social Climate in Which Prominence Is Given to Military Affairs" was posted on the Russian website Irkutskblogspot. Ru on Feb. 7 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The work, published on Feb. 4, Juche 81 (1992), deals with the issue of holding a large-scale military parade to celebrate the 60th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army in the presence of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for strengthening the People's Army and creating a social climate in which prominence is given to military affairs.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded in Thailand, Syria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded in Thailand, Syria
 Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- Personages of Thailand and Syria made public statements on Feb. 15 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, said that thanks to the energetic and tireless leadership of HE Kim Jong Il, socialist fairylands appeared and a great number of modern production centers were built in different parts of Korea to contribute to improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il made a great contribution to the country's reunification and global independence, the chairman noted, adding:
					
					 The exploits he performed for the Korean revolution and world revolution are great, indeed.
					
					 Thanks to respected HE Kim Jong Un, who is creditably carrying forward the idea and cause of the great HE Kim Jong Il, the Korean people will surely build a powerful socialist nation.
					
					 Saber Ballul, head of the Department of the Political Faculty at the University of Damascus of Syria, praised Kim Jong Il as the most outstanding political leader and the greatest man in the world.
					
					 He consolidated the country's military muscle in every way with his unique Songun politics and rallied all the people around the Party, Saber Ballul said, adding:
					
					 He also proactively supported the peoples in their struggle for independence and justice.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il always lives in the hearts of the world people.

articles.title: Ri Yong Ho se reune con la embajadora india en Corea
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho se reune con la embajadora india en Corea
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ACNC) -- El ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Yong Ho, departio hoy en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la embajadora extraordinaria y plenipotenciaria de la Republica de la India en Corea, Jasminder Kasturia, quien le hizo una visita de despedida.

articles.title: Clausurados XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales
articles.content:
Clausurados XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ACNC) -- Quedaron clausurados los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales, iniciados el pasado dia 9 en Phyongchang del Sur de Corea.
					 En la ceremonia de clausura efectuada el dia 25 en el Estadio Olimpico de Phyongchang, participaron la delegacion de alto nivel de la RPDC encabezada por el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yong Chol, la delegacion del Comite Olimpico Nacional de la RPDC, los grupos de hinchas de la RPDC y de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon).
					
					  Asistieron tambien el presidente Moon Jae In y las personalidades del circulo politico y social del Sur de Corea, el presidente del Comite Olimpico Internacional, Thomas Bach, las figuras superiores de varios paises del mundo, los huespedes extranjeros y los aficionados al deporte.
					
					  El publico aplaudio a los deportistas norcoreanos y surcoreanos y los jugadores y el personal de asistencia provenientes de varios paises y regiones que aparecieron en el estadio.
					
					  Kim Yong Chol y el matrimonio del presidente Moon Jae In enviaron saludos agitando las manos a los jugadores del Norte y el Sur que pasaban por delante de la tribuna.
					
					  Mientras se interpretaba la cancion olimpica, la bandera olimpica fue arriada y trasladada al pais patrocinador de los XXIV Juegos Olimpicos Invernales.
					
					  Despues de los discursos de los presidentes del comite organizador de los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales y del Comite Olimpico Internacional, se declaro el cierre del evento y se apago la antorcha.
					
					  Antes de la ceremonia de clausura, Kim Yong Chol intercambio el saludo cordial con nuestros jugadores participantes en los juegos olimpicos.

articles.title: Regresa la delegacion del Comite Olimpico Nacional de la RPDC
articles.content:
Regresa la delegacion del Comite Olimpico Nacional de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ACNC) -- Regreso el dia 26 a esta capital la delegacion del Comite Olimpico Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, encabezada por su presidente y ministro de Deportes, Kim Il Guk, tras tomar parte en los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales efectuados en el Sur de Corea. 
					El mismo dia, llegaron via Kaesong junto con la delegacion los grupos de jugadores, hinchas y periodistas. 
					
					Con anterioridad, arribo el grupo de demostracion de Taekwon-do de la RPDC despues de cumplir el programa de actuacion modelo conjunta de los taekwondocas del Norte y el Sur de Corea.

articles.title: Representacion permanente coreana ante la ONU rechaza sofisteria de secretario general de ONU
articles.content:
Representacion permanente coreana ante la ONU rechaza sofisteria de secretario general de ONU
Pyongyang, 26 de febrero (ACNC) -- La representacion permanente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ante la ONU hizo publico el dia 22 un comunicado comentando las ofensivas verbales del secretario general de la ONU contra la RPDC, lanzadas en la conferencia de seguridad de Munich.
					El documento senala como sigue:
					
					Como esta bien conocido, el secretario general de la ONU hablo en dicha reunion de la "presion mediante las sanciones" calificando las medidas del fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC a contrapelo de la voluntad de la comunidad internacional.
					
					Esto es la sofisteria absurda inconveniente a los deberes del secretario general y nos hace pensar si el fuera lacayo que representa a EE.UU.
					
					El problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana fue surgido de punta a cabo por culpa de EE.UU. y llego al estado actual debido a este pais. Por esta razon, su responsabilidad recae totalmente sobre el mismo.
					
					No podia aparecerse jamas el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana si no hubiera la politica de hostilidad a la RPDC, practicada por el pais norteamericano desde el dia de la fundacion del pais socialista ni extendiera esta politica como abierta chantaje y amenaza nucleares.
					
					Sin saber correctamente la esencia y la causa del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y hablar ni una palabra a EE.UU., culpable de la agravacion de la situacion, el cuestiono las medidas justas de la RPDC. Calificamos esto de un acto vil que partio del extremado prejuicio carente de la imparcialidad.
					
					El secretario general de la ONU debe dejar de imitar al sonambulo al saber correctamente que la amenaza nuclear viene de EE.UU. que desarrolla todo tipo de las armas nucleares modernas y expone la ambicion de ataque preventivo nuclear.
					
					Las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC devienen el poderoso disuasivo que frustra cualquier amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. y controla a este imperio para que no pueda hacer la aventura militar. Y nunca seran la amenaza a ningun pais y region mientras que no se violen la soberania y los intereses de nuestro Estado.
					
					Si el secretario general tiene de veras un interes en la resolucion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana, tiene que aplaudir el actual proceso de la mejora de relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea y someter prontamente al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU el tema de exigir a los paises vecinos que no cometan acciones obstaculizadoras, segun la demanda de la carta del canciller coreano fechado 31 de enero.
